item.title: Following the cyber attacks on the Co-op and M&S, the National Crime Agency said on Wednesday that a 17-year-old British man, a 19-year-old Latvian man, a 19-year-old British man and a 20-year-old British woman were all bailed pending further inquiries. #
item.description: Following the cyber attacks on the Co-op and M&S, the National Crime Agency said on Wednesday that a 17-year-old British man, a 19-year-old Latvian man, a 19-year-old British man and a 20-year-old British woman were all bailed pending further inquiries. #
